name: User
description: Tags related to describing User related data. These tags are used to label data assets to describe the user data in those assets. Example - a table column can be labeled with `User.PhoneNumber` tag. The associated `PII<separator> and `PersonalData<separator> tags are automatically applied. This is done to help users producing the data  focus on describing the data without being policy experts. The associated tags take care of applying classification tags automatically.

children.name: BankAccount
children.description: Bank account number of the user.

children.name: CreditCardNumber
children.description: Credit card number of the user.

children.name: Driver'sLicense
children.description: User's driver's license image or number.

children.name: Login
children.description: User's login name or other identities used for login purposes.

children.name: Name
children.description: Name of the user. This includes full name or partial first name or last name.

children.name: NationalId
children.description: National identification number of the user. This varies from country to country. See [National identification number](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_identification_number) for more details.

children.name: Passport
children.description: User's passport information that includes passport number and passport images.

children.name: SSN
children.description: User's Social Security Number. This might be National Identification Number in some countries.

children.name: Biometric
children.description: Biometric information of the user, such as Face recognition, Iris Recognition, Fingerprint, Voice Recognition, Hand geometry, and Behavior characteristics.

children.name: Genetic
children.description: User's generic data acquired through DNA or RNA analysis.

children.name: MedicalRecords
children.description: User's medical records that tracks events and transaction between user and health care provider.

children.name: Religion
children.description: User's religion information, religious and philosophical beliefs.
